SEARCH
Package controller

Class AdministratorController

java.lang.Object
controller.SessionController
controller.AdministratorController
public class AdministratorController extends SessionController
Controls the administrative operations and user interactions specific to administrators. Manages staff, appointments, medication inventory, and system logs. Provides methods to unlock user accounts and approve refill requests.
Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lim Wee Keat, Tan Wen Rong, Yeoh Kai Wen

    • manageStaff

      public void manageStaff()

    • addStaff

      public void addStaff()
      Adds a new staff member to the hospital staff. Prompts the user to enter the role, ID, and name of the staff member. Checks for duplicates and adds the staff member if they do not already exist. Prints a confirmation message or an error message if the staff member already exists.

    • removeStaff

      public void removeStaff()
      Removes a staff member from the hospital staff. Prompts the user to enter the role and ID of the staff member to be removed. Removes the staff member if they exist and prints a confirmation message. Prints an error message if the staff member does not exist.
